title: Strengthening Deep Learning Competencies: Cognitive Task Analysis for Enhancing Expert Problem-Solving Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced mathematical knowledge and professional problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply Cognitive Task Analysis (CTA) techniques to systematically analyze complex mathematical problems.
Learners can extract experts' problem-solving strategies in a structured manner and integrate them into their practical work.
Learners can complete real-case-based problem-solving projects through collaboration with peers in a PBL (Project-Based Learning) environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
